QAPair.Question: What is (are) Alcoholism - resources ?
QAPair.Answer: The following organizations are good resources for information on alcohol use disorder : Centers for Disease Control and Prevention -- www.cdc.gov/alcohol/fact-sheets.htm , National Institute on Alcohol Abuse and Alcoholism -- www.niaaa.nih.gov/alcohols-effects-health , Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration -- www.samhsa.gov/find-help/atod , Support programs include: Al-Anon Family Groups -- al-anon.org , Alcoholics Anonymous -- www.aa.org , LifeRing Secular Recovery -- lifering.org , Moderation Management -- moderation.org , SMART Recovery -- www.smartrecovery.org , Women for Sobriety -- womenforsobriety.org ,
